page.title: Washington D.C. Area Film Critics Association Awards 2009

revisions.rev:
'''8th WAFCA Awards'''
2009
---- Best Film:
''' [[Up in the Air (film)|Up in the Air]] '''
The '''8th Washington D.C. Area Film Critics Association Awards 2009''' were given in December 2009. ==Winners and nominees== *'''Best Film:''' **'''''[[Up in the Air (film)|Up in the Air]]''''' *''[[The Hurt Locker]]'' *''[[Inglourious Basterds]]'' *''[[Precious (film)|Precious]]'' *''[[Up (2009 film)|Up]]'' *'''Best Director:''' **'''[[Kathryn Bigelow]]''' - '''''[[The Hurt Locker]]''''' *[[Lee Daniels]] - ''[[Precious (film)|Precious]]'' *[[Clint Eastwood]] - ''[[Invictus (film)|Invictus]]'' *[[Jason Reitman]] - ''[[Up in the Air (film)|Up in the Air]]'' *[[Quentin Tarantino]] - ''[[Inglourious Basterds]]'' *'''Best Actor:''' **'''[[George Clooney]]''' - '''''[[Up in the Air (film)|Up in the Air]]''''' *[[Colin Firth]] - ''[[A Single Man (film)|A Single Man]]'' *[[Morgan Freeman]] - ''[[Invictus (film)|Invictus]]'' *[[Viggo Mortenson]] - ''[[The Road (2009 film)|The Road]]'' *[[Jeremy Renner]] - ''[[The Hurt Locker]]'' *'''Best Actress:''' **'''[[Carey Mulligan]]''' - '''''[[An Education]]''''' *[[Sandra Bullock]] - ''[[The Blind Side (film)|The Blind Side]]'' *[[Maya Rudolph]] - ''[[Away We Go]]'' *[[Gabourey Sidibe]] - ''[[Precious (film)|Precious]]'' *[[Meryl Streep]] - ''[[Julie and Julia]] *'''Best Supporting Actor:''' **'''[[Christoph Waltz]]''' - '''''[[Inglourious Basterds]]''''' *[[Woody Harrelson]] - ''[[The Messenger (2009 film)|The Messenger]] *[[Anthony Mackie]] - ''[[The Hurt Locker]]'' *[[Alfred Molina]] - ''[[An Education]]'' *[[Stanley Tucci]] - ''[[The Lovely Bones (film)|Lovely Bones]] *'''Best Supporting Actress:''' **'''[[Mo'Nique]]''' - '''''[[Precious (film)|Precious]]''''' *[[Vera Farmiga]] - ''[[Up in the Air (film)|Up in the Air]]'' *[[Anna Kendrick]] - ''[[Up in the Air (film)|Up in the Air]]'' *[[Julianne Moore]] - ''[[A Single Man (film)|A Single Man]]'' *[[Samantha Morton]] - ''[[The Messenger (2009 film)|The Messenger]] *'''Best Adapted Screenplay:''' **'''''[[Up in the Air (film)|Up in the Air]]''''' - '''[[Jason Reitman]]''' and '''[[Sheldon Turner]]''' *''[[An Education]]'' - [[Nick Hornby]] *''[[The Blind Side (film)|The Blind Side]]'' - [[John Lee Hancock]] *''[[Precious (film)|Precious]]'' - [[Geoffrey S. Fletcher|Geoffrey Fletcher]] *''[[The Road (2009 film)|The Road]]'' - [[Joe Penhall]] *'''Best Original Screenplay:''' **'''''[[Inglourious Basterds]]''''' - '''[[Quentin Tarantino]]''' *''[[(500) Days of Summer]]'' - [[Scott Neustadter]] and [[Michael H. Weber]] *''[[A Serious Man]]'' - [[Ethan Coen]] and [[Joel Coen]] *''[[The Hurt Locker]]'' - [[Mark Boal]] *''[[Up (2009 film)|Up]]'' - [[Pete Docter]], [[Bob Peterson (animator)|Bob Peterson]] and [[Thomas McCarthy (actor)|Thomas McCarthy]] *'''Best Breakthrough Performance:''' **'''[[Gabourey Sidibe]]''' - '''''[[Precious (film)|Precious]]''''' *[[Anna Kendrick]] - ''[[Up in the Air (film)|Up in the Air]]'' *[[Christian McKay]] - ''[[Me and Orson Welles]]'' *[[Carey Mulligan]] - ''[[An Education]]'' *[[Jeremy Renner]] - ''[[The Hurt Locker]]'' *'''Best Cast:''' **'''''[[The Hurt Locker]]''''' *''[[Nine (film)|Nine]]'' *''[[Precious (film)|Precious]]'' *''[[Star Trek (film)|Star Trek]]'' *''[[Up in the Air (film)|Up in the Air]]'' *'''Best Animated Film:''' **'''''[[Up (2009 film)|Up]]''''' *''[[Coraline]]'' *''[[Fantastic Mr. Fox (film)|Fantastic Mr. Fox]] *''[[9 (2009 film)|9]]'' *''[[Ponyo]]'' *'''Best Documentary Film:''' **'''''[[Food, Inc.]]''''' *''[[Anvil!
